Name: Box with Carved Scenes of King Tutankhamun and His Queen
Description: This wooden chest with colored ivory panels shows a seated King Tutankhamun facing a pond and shooting wildfowl and fish. The queen is sitting on a cushion with an arrow in her left hand waiting to pass it to the king. On the lid, the king is seen with his queen, who is handing him bouquets of lotus and papyri. Flowers surround them.
